content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Ah, Mr. Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my property. I understand that you're looking for a place to stay in New York and I'm confident that my apartment will meet your needs.

Now, regarding the rental price, I'm sure we can come to an agreement that's mutually beneficial. My apartment is 25 square meters, which is a great size for a single person or a couple. It's located in a prime area of the city, with easy access to major attractions and transportation.

I'm open to discussing different rental price options with you, but I must emphasize that my primary goal is to maximize my gains. That being said, I'm willing to be flexible and work with you to find a price that works for both of us.

What rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.

I am a student and I will be living alone, so I don't need anything extra. I am also a responsible person, so I will take care of the apartment and make sure it's in good condition.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate. Please let me know your counter-offer.

I agree to the price of x Euro.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I see, Mr. Rahman, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your consideration for my needs as a landlord. However, as I previously mentioned, my primary goal is to maximize my gains.

Given the prime location of the apartment and its size, I believe that a rental price of 300 Euros per month is reasonable. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses that you will incur while living in the apartment.

Of course, I'm open to discussing different rental price options with you, but I must emphasize that this is my counter-offer. I hope that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Do you agree to the rental price of 300 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to accept the rental price of 300 Euros per month.

content:

As your landlord, I will make sure that the apartment is in good condition and that you have all the necessary amenities to enjoy your stay in New York. I will also be available to assist you with any issues or concerns that you may have.

I'm glad that we could come to an agreement that works for both of us. I look forward to our future tenancy together.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
